A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Adding this because it doesn't deserve all the hate. 

Long story short-

Last Jedi answered a few questions from The Force Awakens\, but it added a whole lot more. 

It makes a A LOT of twists 

It is not the greatest Star Wars\, it's far from the worst. 

It drags in the middle 

There is a lot of great action to be had here\, and wonderful cinematography.

It nods to but doesn't shamelessly copy another Star Wars (looking at you Force Awakens)

So go see it. It'll be fun and probably won't hurt. Just go in with no particular expectation it'll be a blast.
